thread.title: CHGT Continues Expansion Plans, Now in Talks on Entering Accessory Market
thread.title_full: CHGT Continues Expansion Plans, Now in Talks on Entering Accessory Market

author: admin
title: CHGT Continues Expansion Plans, Now in Talks on Entering Accessory Market
text:
Changing Technologies, Inc. 
HOUSTON -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Changing Technologies, Inc. (OTCBB:CHGT) is in discussions with a retail product developer about 3D printing a line of activewear bracelets, watches and eyewear, such as sunglasses. CHGT would provide the developer a range of 3D services, including design consultation, design finalizing, product visualization animations, prototyping and the production of end-user merchandise. 
“This is yet another step forward in our ongoing plans to build consistent revenue streams and increase shareholder value,” said CHGT CEO Marco Valenzuela. “Thanks to our exposure at tradeshows and other events , we’ve established a solid pipeline of business prospects that we expect will continue to grow. The market has reacted positively and with great interest concerning our emerging list of product offerings, including the upcoming portal , our printing services and our consulting line .” 
The 3D printing industry continues to be one of the world’s hottest markets. Market forecasts change almost daily due to new technology breakthroughs. 
The latest predictions now indicate 3D printing will enjoy a robust 19.3 percent compound annual growth rate through 2020. A recent technology survey found that two out of every three industrial manufacturers are using 3D printing, while another study showed 75 percent of large companies have adopted 3D printing and 59 percent of smaller companies are using it. 
For more information on CHGT, please visit www.changingtechno.com . 
For more information on 6 th Dimension Technologies, please visit http://www.6d3d.com . 
About Changing Technologies, Inc. 
Changing Technologies, Inc. (CHGT) is an emerging technology company focused on developing innovative concepts to bring to consumers. It recently created a new subsidiary — 6 th Dimension Technologies — to pursue additional growth areas and market needs in the booming 3D printing sector. A forward-thinking company working to be at the forefront of the next generation of consumer-based technology, CHGT is positioning itself to leverage global demand for the latest technological advances and services the company offers. Changing Technologies, Inc. is in the cutting-edge technology sphere alongside companies like Voxelijet AG ( VJET ), Arcam AB ( AMAVF ), and ExOne Co. ( XONE ).
